222294.description:
From the introduction:

Long ago a sect of elves made a pact with the devil Gheryon. In exchange for winged flight the elves gave away their long life. The aerial elves crafted flying fortress and waged war on their kin. The surface elves united and used their combined magic to send the fortresses crashing to ground. The surface elves thought the aerial elves were extinct but one fortress and its lost race of winged elves survived. Now an Ogre Mage Jhang has found the fortress and is using it to plunder the kingdom. He is aided by hippogriff riding orcs and the cruel aerial elves. The elf lord Faeradoon has quested you to fight the evil and be rewarded richly. His direct assault failed and his forces never returned. He bids you use stealth on this attempt.

222295.name: Beloved of Set
222295.description:
From the introduction:

Some centuries ago a Poet and a Priestess fell in love. Which is almost never a good thing in real life, though it makes for fantastic drama. Anyway, to make an old story short, they were about to elope when they were discovered. The Poet was enslaved by the powerful High Priest, Set's Beloved and the Priestess was stood up at their meeting place. She waited for three days and three nights before finally, having become quite stupidly distraught, throwing herself into the nearby well. Now, on moonless nights, the Priestess's ghost can be found waiting by the well.

222296.name: The Tomb of Nesta the Mischievous
222296.description:
From the introduction:

Nesta's tomb is a treasure trove but its rooms may drive tomb robbers to fits of paranoia.

222297.name: The Mage's Prison
222297.description:
From the introduction:

This prison was built by ancient Magi to serve as a court and jail for mages consumed by Hubris. The prison itself is an extra-dimensional space, recently found at the bottom of a dry well. The Prison has been out of commission for whole aeons, and has been heavily looted by those who sought the knowledge of the ancients.

222298.name: Evil Experimentation Lab
222298.description:
From the introduction:

Laboratory Level 3

User summary:

This item was submitted to the one page dungeon contest 2012.

222299.name: Night in "Al-Farhad's Pearl"
222299.description:
From the introduction:

Al-Farhad’s Pearl is the beautiful oasis in the middle of the Wicked Desert trade route. It is the only place where occasional wanderers and merchants can rest safely after hard and dangerous travel. There is a comfortable caravanserai of the same name near oasis. Under building basement lies secret slavers base. And sometimes careless and tired oasis visitors disappear right in the middle of the night...

222300.name: Will No One Rid Me of these Troublesome Goblins?
222300.description:
From the introduction:

In a hole in the ground lived a tribe of goblins. Not a mischievous race of lovable sneak thieves, these. The goblins of this tribe are evil incarnate, sprung forth whole from a pit of foul ichor located deep underground. Now the cruelty of the goblin tribe plagues the land, and the good people lock their doors and pray out the long nights for heroes that might deliver them surcease from their sorrows. Repeating the rumors of the pool of pestilence that calls the goblins forth, the local rulers have at last found said heroes and enticed them with visions of gold and glory. Standing now on the threshold of the long dark lair of the goblins, the heroes begin their descent into darkness, and their journey to greatness...

222301.name: Tentacle Thing
222301.description:
From the introduction:

The adventurers' inn of choice. Good food, clean sheets, fine ale and stories of the fantastic around the open fire in the common rooms. With beds to sleep 24 a busy night can see over one hundred people in the common rooms and bars.

Gunnerman, a retired adventurer, can be found most nights in the main common room telling stories of his adventures in the west.

222302.name: Temple of the Demon Speakers
222302.description:
From the introduction:

Long ago the Cult of Demon Speakers performed evil ceremonies in this underground temple. Until one day, a mob of righteous peasants came in with torches and pitchforks, and the cult was destroyed. But the high priest soon rose again in undeath, determined to continue his worship. To stop him, the local god led two sheep into the temple, where they were blessed with humanoid form. They managed to lock up the priest and started to cleanse the evil temple.

222304.name: Arena of Blood
222304.description:
From the introduction:

The blood-sport Arena in the city of Korrnegrum re-opened six months ago, featuring all manner of full-bore bullfighting, dog fights, and gladiatorial games. The operators are secretly the Cult of Vultaash, a 100-year-old cabal dedicated to the resurrection of a suppressed demon. Blood spilt in the arena revives the abomination, drop by scarlet drop...

222305.name: By Esophagus Brood
222305.description:
From the introduction:

Ages past, a massive worm was petrified erupting from a nearby stony hill. Local dwarves moved in, died off, and were replaced by other creatures. Recently it was the hiding place of the Heart of Dur, a magical ruby that was recovered by brave adventurers. But recovery of the heart awakened something darker and it is time to return and set things right.

222306.name: Only Acrobats Need Apply
222306.description:
From the introduction:

Your band of gymnastic second-story experts has stepped in it now. The streets are full of sword and spear wielding guards. A mob with torches follows. Escape is on the other side of town where a magician waits outside of the town’s wards. The only path is across the rooftops of town.

222307.name: Vault of Vintage
222307.description:
From the introduction:

The local baron is an ailing man who thoroughly enjoys a glass of fine wine very often for medicinal reasons. Recently something or someone has been drinking his most prized collection. Angry the baron hires a group of seasoned adventurers to explore the wine cellar and determine if this is paranormal or simply a thief. Unbeknownst to the player characters a wine troll has taken up residence in the cellar.

222308.name: Kibhur's Dungeon
222308.description:
From the introduction:

The land of Illban is ruled by Souldragon family for many generations. Recently the prince Crat ascended the throne and settled a lot of changes in the court: all the magic-users and pagans were “invited” to leave their position.

222309.name: The Iron Cloud
222309.description:
From the introduction:

Drifting aimlessly over the wastes there is a ruined giant metal airship known as The Iron Cloud among the unwashed masses: mutants, peasants, robo-cultists also known as: Zadrilon's Folly among the learned few: scholars and space wizards also: The Flying Fortress of Kragofax among those left in its path.

222310.name: The Mad Riddler's Halls
222310.description:
From the introduction:

...a large sarcophagus sits among a large pile of gold and silver coins. Within it rest body and spirit of the mad riddler waiting for a host with a sharp mind but a weak will to walk amongst the living once again...

222311.name: Fortunes Well
222311.description:
From the introduction:

Missing relics and a mysterious well. These are the things that have drawn your party to this idyllic region of the land. Why would someone take sacred objects, what do they have to do with each other... and why does the trail lead to a well in the middle of a lake?

An adventure for 5th-8th level characters.

222312.name: One Page Dungeon Contest Submission Guide
rpgcategory: Non-Rankable Item (item will not show in the rankings)
222312.description:
From the introduction:

The following requirements must be met in order for a submission to be accepted.

If a submission is rejected because it does not meet these requirements, the creator may make necessary changes and resubmit the entry.

User summary:

A formal presentation of guidelines, suggestions, tips, tricks, and - of course - requirements for legal submissions to the one page dungeon contest.

222313.name: Joy-Con
222313.description:
One controller or two, vertical or sideways, motion controls or buttons... Joy‑Con and Nintendo Switch give you total gameplay flexibility.

Nintendo sells the left and right Joy-Con individually, or has pairs of them available. A pair is also bundled with the Switch console itself.

Source: The Developer Website.

222314.name: Hastings, Stamford Bridge, Fulford - 1066
222314.description:
Game about three batlles of the 1066, where Normans and Vikings attacked England. At Stamford Brige Englishmen managed to defeat the vikings, but they were beated at Fulford. Hastings was decisive batlle, where Normans managed to win.

Game uses the rules for the "Medieval" system, with classic "I move - you move" mechanics. Unitss are infantry and cavalry, light, medium and heavy, along with archers and leaders. Cavalry may charge to make it's attack more devastating.

Morale plays the important role in the mechanics - as he number of the losses increases, the stronger enemy player attacks. Defeated units might be weakened, destroyed or disordered.

222315.name: Peipus Lake 1242
222315.description:
Game about battle at Peipus Lake, known as "Battle on Ice", where armies of the Novogrod defeated teutonic knights.

Game uses the rules for the "Medieval" system, with classic "I move - you move" mechanics. Unitss are infantry and cavalry, light, medium and heavy, along with archers and leaders. Cavalry may charge to make it's attack more devastating. Russians have also some mounted archer tatar units.

Morale plays the important role in the mechanics - as he number of the losses increases, the stronger enemy player attacks. Defeated units might be weakened, destroyed or disordered.

boardgamecompilation: Frostgrave: The Hunt for the Golem
222317.description:
The Frostgrave Folio is the complete, single-volume collection of all the previously released Frostgrave digital mini-supplements.

Within these pages can be found "The Hunt for the Golem", "Sellsword", "Dark Alchemy" and "Arcane Locations".

Also included is a new mini-supplement, "The Ravages of Time".
222317.name: The Frostgrave Folio

222319.name: Bitcoin Empire
222319.description:
In the super-fast competitive card game Bitcoin Empire, you are a plucky, pioneering entrepreneur trying to collect and keep as many bitcoins as possible in storage. Bitcoins are represented by face down cards. The game ends when the last card is drawn from the deck and whoever has the most face down cards at that point in storage is the winner.

Every player gets a character card. Characters have ranks on three different skills: law, coding and marketing. You also have a bitcoin storage rating which determines how many face down cards can be stored underneath the character.

The main deck of cards is shuffled and each player is dealt two cards. There are several different types. Exchanges can be played down as places to store face down cards based on the bitcoin rating. Hack, Lawsuit and Smear Campaign are attack cards that can be played against an opponents Exchange or character is your ranks in law, coding and marketing respectively are greater than the targets. If successful all the cards in that storage are discarded without looking at them and the Exchange card is taken to the hand of the attacking player. Alternatively these attack cards can be played underneath the character as extra ranks of the applicable icon. Internet Meltdown cards can also be played on the characters to increase their ranks but the Satoshi card will wipe them all away if played. Also, Head Hunter cards can steal an opponents skill cards. Bribe cards can be played to cancel any attack or the Head Hunter.

So keep your wits about you as you take on the fledgling crypto-market and build your empire.

222320.name: Orphic Hybrid Class
222320.description:
From publisher blurb:

An intermediary between the occult world and the world of the warriors, the orphic joins mental powers to physical fury. Since her prime age, she hears mysterious voices of power or folly speaking in her mind. Whether she learns to control her paranormal gifts or is overwhelmed by them, this condition plunges the orphic in a battle fury neither physical nor spiritual, but of mind and emotions.

An orphic is constantly on the edge between discipline and chaos, mind and body, sanity and madness. She can find a purpose and a sense in the company of others, that help her to remain stable.

a 1-20 hybrid class based on the Barbarian and Psychic.

Introduces Mindrage the Orphic's signature power, which permits insight into the world of the occult while also threatening her sanity and emotional balance.

222321.name: Words Of Wonder
222321.description:
User Summary

Crossword style, find a word game.

222322.name: Scouts and Spies
222322.description:
From publisher blurb:

Knowing is Half the Battle

There is battle, and then there is warfare. Many adventurers are familiar with wading into combat against monsters and small groups of enemies, but this is nothing next to the glory and chaos and carnage that is true war. More than simply a change in scale, the difference between war and other combat can be profound. In a war, the characters are part of something larger than themselves, contributing to the efforts of their armies, or perhaps leading those armies themselves. The priorities of a soldier are different from those of an adventurer, and often the challenges that they face are, as well. While many characters can translate their talents as adventurers to the battlefield, one who specifically focuses on warfare and battlefield tactics will have the edge on others when it comes to true war. Each installment of Weekly Wonders: Archetypes of War provides six new war-themed archetypes for a variety of classes.

For this book, we focus on scouts and spies. Though they’re rarely found on the front lines, they nonetheless place themselves in incredible danger, going into the lion’s den to extract their enemy’s secrets or sabotage their efforts, knowing all the while that one wrong move could spell their doom, and no one will be coming to help them if things go awry. This book features archetypes designed for scouting and spying, whether it’s by stealth, guile, or other means.

The battlefield infiltrator, an investigator archetype whose skills are more suited to battlefield infiltration, and siege warfare.
The psychic interrogator, a mesmerist archetype that can dive deep into the minds of others to uncover their secrets.
The monk of the silent wind, a monk archetype that can render himself silent and invisible, and deliver deadly assassin strikes.
The double agent, a vigilante archetype that has two social identities and two vigilante identities, and fights on both sides of a given conflict.
The far watcher, a witch archetype that allows her familiar to do the spying while she remains at a safe distance.
A bonus archetype for the stalker, from Path of War by Dreamscarred Press, the shadow knight can control shadows to conceal himself, protect him against attacks, and escape from his foes.

222323.name: Breachworld Character Folio #1: 402
222323.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to the first Character Folio for the Breachworld RPG, featuring a possible antagonist, ally, foil, or all of the above in the form of a relentless
mechanical assassin. He has much to offer in any of those roles, with depths and possibilities for his character that are a fruitful ground of role-playing
opportunities. And, because he has full stats at different levels of experience, he can fit in nicely as an addition to any table, or even as a pre-generated
character.

Included in this supplement:

402, the Machine Man assassin, described and illustrated
Four character sheets for the character at four different levels of experience
Adventure ideas for involving 402 in your campaign

222324.name: New Frontier: Apollyon the Omega
222324.description:
From publisher blurb:

Right from the pages of the best-selling WatchGuard Sourcebook comes the "NEW FRONTIER" WG Solo series!

Meet the dreaded APOLLYON!!

Never-before-available in any format! This newest solo release features a cosmic despot from the WGU universe!

Millenia old. The last of a proud race. The murderer of untold trillions. The conqueror of countless galaxies. And now, he's headed YOUR WAY! What is his end goal? Who could possibly stop him? How will we survive?!?!?!

222325.name: Little Heroes Quick-Start Rules: The Lost Faery
222325.description:
From publisher blurb:

Little Heroes is a storytelling game designed for families and young children. Its mechanics are designed to be simple while encouraging creativity among the players. It’s a lot like telling a bed-time story, but with a lot more interaction.

Taking place in a fantasy land, players become heroes shorter than one foot tall, taking on the world around them as it towers well above.

The Lost Faery is a quick-start rules set providing everything you need to get into a game of Little Heroes.

The Lost Faery includes:

Quick-start rules
Pregenerated Personalities
A short Scenario
An Appendix of terminology




All you need to add is a set of dice and some imagination! With some adult guidance, children as young as 5 can join in on the fantasy storytelling fun!

222326.name: Kitchen Scramble
222326.description:
Cook up delicious dishes and delight customers as you travel the world to learn new recipes in your very own Food Truck!

Source: The Developer Website.

222327.name: The Vagary of Fire
222327.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Dicemaster Adventure for 3rd level characters

When people start going missing from the region of Raneralk, the Free Nation of Erilgor sends heroes to investigate. Arriving in the representative village of Denop, there are few clues, but trouble is always brewing with the neighboring Roc-Knocker Goblins, and the villagers insist they know something about it. Desperate to save the missing villagers our heroes will need to brave the perils of the massive Toma's Dormer, a dangerous hike few attempt.

Many rumors surround the dormer, but are any of them true? Tales of lost cities, treasure troves of gold, and of evil cults practicing ancient magic deep within it's caverns run wild amongst the smallfolk of Raneralk. The PC's will learn what lies within, as the investigation brings them into greater conflict with the cliff dwelling goblins and their evil masters.

Can the PC's save the villagers in time? Why are people disappearing without so much as a ransom note? What will become of the region should the PC's fail?

222328.name: Typer Shark Deluxe
222328.description:
Typer Shark Deluxe aims to improve your skills by letting you use the keyboard as a weapon. You play a diver who faces sharks that attack and prevent you from taking treasures in the ocean depths. There are two game modes: Adventure and Abyss. In the Adventure mode, the game increases difficulty (more sharks or sharks that require longer or more words to be typed) as players progress through the adventure map. In the Abyss mode, the difficulty increases the deeper the diver goes. The game also features a tutor to teach players how to type and practice typing. The game can measure a players typing per minute and adjust the difficulty based on the player's typing skill level.
- User summary

222329.name: Crossword Puzzles
222329.description: Classic crossword puzzle game on Facebook.

222330.name: RND (Issue 4 - Feb 2017)
222330.description:
RND
Issue 4
February 2017

The _____ in the _____
A _____ adventure for _____ to _____ adventurers.

222331.name: RND (Issue 4 Map Pack)
222331.description:
Supplemental full page map pack to support and expand RND Issue 4.

Distributed as a ZIP archive of seven PDF documents intended for print-and-play support for the Issue 4 generators. Usually distributed alongside Issue 4.

222332.name: Endure the Stars: Survivors Gender Variant
222332.description:
Finding more survivors is the priority. We need to bolster our ranks with as many crew as we can find, the more skilled the better. The Gender Variant Character Class Pack introduces 6 gender variants of the core game character classes. Each one of these characters also comes with a completely new set of abilities different from those of the core game characters. Better still, these abilities can be interchanged with the core game character’s abilities, unlocking a whole new set of tricks!

Pack contents:
6x Character dashboards
6x Ability tokens
6x Health tokens
6x Resolve tokens
18 x Injury tokens
6x Survivor miniatures
6x Colour matched base clips

222334.name: Vacation Quest: The Hawaiian Islands
222334.description:
Vacation Quest: The Hawaiian Islands is a Hawaiian Vacation themed Hidden object game. Players are vacationers exploring 28 different islands scenes during their vacation. Finding hidden seashells allows the players to extend their vacation to explore new locations.

- user summary

222336.name: Rotted Capes: Survivor's Guide Volume 1
222336.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

A Rotted Capes supplement with lots of new powers, sources archetypes, power tricks, sorcery and other options for your Heroes.

222337.name: The Tavern Companion
222337.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

A guide to the most essential part of any tabletop RPG, the Tavern. Whether you're here to drink, fight or talk quests it has it all!

222338.description:
Game System

The Midnight Legion is a highly advanced, color illustrated gamebook trilogy in the style of the classic Choose Your Own Adventure series, but with MUCH more control over your character and world—think of an advanced version of SORCERY or LONE WOLF, with deeper character generation. An interactive story is combined with combat, strategy, puzzles, diplomacy, stealth and role playing elements. Collect information, knowledge, and goods from the world around you to advance your character.

2-player Version

In this variation, one player reads the entries like a game master to another player who experiences the world of Midnight Legion. All the rolls for the encounters are handled by the reader and the player handles all of his or her character's dice rolls. This is also a good way for the game master player to introduce the game to someone who doesn't know all the rules.

Game Play

You must choose whether to complete your objectives using combat, stealth or sixth sense and diplomacy. You can solve the puzzles that unlock the base’s secrets using logic, or you can try to recover your lost memories for clues.

Choices

Whatever you decide, your actions change the world around you and determine the encounters you face next. Every game you play will be different – and you will need all of your skills to survive.

Theme of The World Reborn:

More than four centuries have passed since the Devastation engulfed the Earth. The species that remained were fused and reborn in the alchemy of atomic fire. Now their diverse descendants have claimed the planet. You are an agent of the Midnight Legion, tasked with preserving life and rebuilding civilization. Only one other agent remains, and she is somewhere ahead of you, racing for your last remaining base. Unless you can reach it before she does, she will seize the command center and use its ancient weapons to unleash a second Devastation. This time, if she succeeds, nothing will survive. Your chase will lead you to new creatures, lost technologies and possibly even the clues your adversary leaves behind. But beware—there are no established paths across this constantly shifting land, and nothing is what it seems.
222338.name: Midnight Legion: The World Reborn

222339.name: Sultans of Wind: Relics of Power
222339.description:
Sultans of Wind: Relics of Power adds twelve new cloud tiles to the Sultans of Wind base game. Some of these tiles have pillars on them, with a relic being placed randomly atop each pillar for players to grab during play. Players can typically use these relics to attack or block one another.

Sultans of Wind: Relics of Power also includes new gameplay modes.

222340.name: Venice Deluxe
222340.description:
The basic gameplay consists of a gondola controlled by the player that shoots various treasures (Keys, Hearts, Coins, Rings, Vases, Stars and Lyres) directly upward towards plates that have matching slots on the side of a building in an attempt to match the treasure with its matching slot. Plates come in varied shapes such as bars, circles, half-circles, T-shapes, and X-shapes. They may hold as few as one and as many as eight treasure slots, and they may not be stationary. Some feature hinges that cause them to rotate when hit, while others shift or rotate positions when hit. The player usually has the ability to cycle between two treasures before firing.

If a player manages to hit a high matching slot, the treasure will usually tumble and fill one or more lower slots for a combo bonus; each successive tumble increases the bonus and the chance of a power-up popping up. Bank shots earn extra points; when a treasure makes an inordinate amount of banks shots before filling a slot, the player is given a "Lucky shot" bonus. Once a grouping of slots are filled, that grouping vanishes and awards the player more points.

A fired treasure can be diverted by obstacles that include bumpers (stone walls or ledges off of which treasures will bounce), locks and blocks (barriers that require a specific treasure to unlock), bricks (obstacles that crumble when hit), chutes (cylinders that redirect any treasure fired into them), shelves (special plates that hold a number of treasures), teleports (swirly objects that warp treasures from point to point) and baskets (baskets that catch treasures and then drop them). If a player misfires, the treasure will either shatter after a long period of bouncing around the screen, or it will plunge into the water, costing the player one of three lives for that level. The player may prevent this by catching the treasure before it plunges.

After each section of a building is completed, the water level rises to introduce a new part of the building, until all the sections are completed to finish the level.

When a level is completed, the player receives scoring for accuracy, speed of completion, number of combos scored, and how many tries the player took to complete a level.
Game modes

The game includes four game modes, three of which must be unlocked:

Journey: Basic gameplay
Flood: An action mode in which the river level rises at a steady rate. Icons that splash in the water no longer cost the player, but sections must be completed before the water level engulfs them or the level is failed.
Survival: Like Flood mode, but a single building that never ends.
Trick shots: Nothing but trick shots. The player is given a reward of 1,000 points for a successful trick shot, incrementing 1,000 points with each successful trick shot, and resetting to 1,000 after a failure.

There are 72 total buildings (levels) in the game among 8 neighborhoods. As with most PopCap games, Venice features online leaderboards.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venice_%28video_game%29 Venice (video game)]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

222341.name: Duck Game
222341.description:
Enter the futuristic year of 1984, an age where ducks run wild in a frantic battle for glory. Blast your friends with Shotguns, Net Guns, Mind Control Rays, Saxophones, Magnet Guns, and much, much more. This is DUCK GAME. Don't blink.

Source: The Publisher Website.

222342.name: Dead and Buried
222342.description:
Step into a world full of gunslingers and ghosts in Dead and Buried. Grab your Touch controllers and become the best gunslinger in the wild west in this multiplayer action shooter. Battle it out in the old saloon. Rob a runaway train. Team up with other bandits and defend against hordes of ghastly creatures. Finally, you can live out your wild west fantasies thanks to virtual reality. We teamed up with Oculus Studios to deliver this one of a kind VR experience! Offering 5 unique game play modes!

Source: The Developer Website.

222343.name: Audioshield
222343.description:
Block the beats! Audioshield puts you at the point of impact for every hit in your songs. Block incoming orbs with your shields and feel the music. Works with any song file, plus online music streaming and Song of the Day.

Source: The Game Website.

222345.name: Prehistoric Park Builder
222345.description:
Prehistoric Park will show you a whole new angle of the prehistoric life. Take up the call of the primeval past and enter the world of crazy prehistoric rides and attractions! Turn the boring caveman’s life into a wonderful never-ending holiday!

You can choose from more than 60 mind boggling attractions and rides. Build the biggest and craziest prehistoric theme park ever!

Decorate your theme park with exotic trees, unique flowers, pagan totems and stone temples.

Offer your guests a fruit cocktail, cook them a great kabob and treat them with the first ever ice cream.

And don’t forget to hire workers. They will keep your fun park running and take care of visitors.

Play with your friends and share your achievements! Compete with them to build the best amusement park!

Source: The Game Website.

222346.name: Crazy 8 Multiplayer
222346.description:
Crazy Eights is a shedding card game where you can play against friends, train with a robot, or challenge other players in the community who are online at the same time as you.

Crazy 8 is colorful, fast and crazy fun!

It’s easy to learn and fun for all ages!

Experience the thrill of the game while trying to hit the jackpot!

Crazy 8, the card game everyone is crazy about!

Source: The Developer Website.

222347.name: Water Bugs
222347.description:
A sequel to Cosmic Bugs, Water Bugs is a Qix-like area control game set underwater where various mechanical versions of water creatures roam the boundaries and field you are trying to control by sealing off.
- User Summary

222348.name: Sweater? OK!
222348.description:
User Summary
A reversed Snake game where you are the apple trying to run away from the snake!
The snake is made from buttons, and your location; sweaters!

222349.name: CPU Invaders
222349.description:
User Summary
A desktop overlay game; your computer in invaded! Shoot down the invaders to free your computer!

While playing you can still use your computer for your things; watching movies on the Net, chatting - writing on VGG!

222350.name: Arma III Karts
222350.description:
Start your engines - this is Arma 3 Karts! When we unveiled our 2014 April Fools joke via the Splendid Split parody video, some of you were quite keen for us to release the go-karts package for real. And here it is, for everyone to try. Enjoy this little sidestep in our typically military sandbox!
Key Features
- Kart - A 20hp 4-stroke engine go-kart with four unique liveries and one random color variant.
- Racer - Matching race drivers wearing dedicated race helmets.
- Marshal - A racetrack safety coordinator.
- Starter Pistol - This special revolver is used to signal the start of races and fires signaling flares.
- Race Objects - Various (plastic) barriers used to build racetracks.
- Time Trials - A new form of singleplayer Challenges delivered in 5 Karts Check Point races against the clock.
- Zeus Race & Modules - Special modules to build Check Point races, and pre-set races to jump straight into the multiplayer action.

Source: The Game Website.

222351.name: Belote Multiplayer
222351.description:
The game offers the chance to play Belote against real players in real time, recreating the entire experience of card games played between family and friends. Many options and animations are proposed, such as the Coinche mode, skill gaming and the ability to send gifts to friends.

Source: The Developer Website.

222352.description:
Ladies in the government, a new Orator ability, improved abilities for Generals, rules to cast out two-time presidential losers and the ability to try Statesmen for sedition are the new features in this Founding Fathers expansion.

Includes 18 cards and 5 plastic rings.

Fully compatible with both Founding Fathers, Founding Fathers Green Edition and Founding Fathers: Offices & Statesmen.
222352.name: Founding Fathers: Ladies & Orators

222353.name: The Wizard's Pen
222353.description:
The Wizard has vanished! The clues to his whereabouts are in his workbook, but all the pages are blank. With the Wizard's Pen, players will reveal images in the book. Most puzzles involve revealing a small portion of the image at a time. Some puzzles involve a blurry photo that needs to be brought into focus. Other puzzles involved being zoomed in too close to an image. The sooner you can identify the image, the higher your score and the closer you are to finding the wizard.
- user summary

222354.name: Wordox The Word Snatcher
222354.description:
Available today in 7 languages, Wordox is a board game based on letters and strategy. Tactics are as important as vocabulary in order to win games, making the game fun, unique and accessible for everyone.

The players create words and steal points from their opponents by using the letters they have already placed on the game board. Games can easily be turned around! To win, the payers should capitalize on their own strengths: a good vocabulary, a tactical mind… a touch of deviousness and even a pinch of luck! Every strategy counts!

Source: The Developer Website.

222355.name: Bazoo
222355.description:
Tired of surfing in the subway? Tired of aligning candy? Tired of throwing birds?
Come face the other players in Bazoo the 1st arcade game in PvP Real Time in intense and frantic battle!

Source: The Developer Website.

222356.name: Super Kiwi Castle Run
222356.description:
In Super Kiwi Castle Run, a free downloadable endless runner, our hero Super Kiwi embarks on a knightly adventure where he will overcome dragons, witches and other scoundrels in order to rescue the princess trapped in the castle tower.

To succeed, Super Kiwi must run as far and as long as possible, overcoming villains who cross his path. His journey through the castle, from the drawbridge to the tower passing through the dungeons, will be punctuated by epic battles with the giant dragon.

Source: The Developer Website.

222357.name: Is Cool
222357.description:
Welcome to the adorable, high in vitamins and fun universe of Is Cool!

Without delay, Mister Kwizz will propose you to play a fabulous quiz.

Answer all of his silly questions, challenge your friends or the community and show them that you are THE Champion! After the quizzes, the adventure is not over!

Take part in the game and enjoy a walk in the universe of Is Cool: Play with cows from space, feed koalas hunting a mammoth, meet our Stock-Father and encounter many other surprises! All these mini-games will enable you to win crazy images from the 300+ Kiwi characters. If you want to collect all the images, you are welcome in one of the biggest trading communities on Facebook.

Join the community and start collecting happy moments!

Source: The Developer Website.

222358.name: Jupiter Rescue: Excess Mass
222358.description:
Card Name: Excess Mass
Type: Setback

Place a Super Creep on the Evacuation Pod. Until it is killed Colonists cannot cannot be loaded onto the Evacuation Pod and it cannot be launched. No Colonists in the Pod are converted by this Super Creep.

222360.name: Finding Bigfoot
222360.description:
User Summary

The newspapers Jasper published message about the disappearance of a group of tourists in the national park. Police believe it was just an accident, because the band went to raft on the river.

222362.name: My Little Blacksmith Shop
222362.description:
Simple game I made using the Unreal Engine 4. Connect parts together and sell them to your customers.

Source: The Game Website.

222363.name: The 7th Edition Guide to Cthulhu Invictus
222363.description:
Cosmic Horror Role Playing in Ancient Rome






UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

A guidebook for Cthulhu Invictus, cosmic horror investigations in Ancient Rome, updated for the 7th edition Call of Cthulhu Rule set.

222364.name: Freeport Companion: A Sourcebook for Shadow of the Demon Lord
222364.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

rpgitemversion: Condensed Black and White Softcover Version
222365.name: Song of Swords
222365.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

Song of Swords is a tabletop roleplaying game focused on taking combat to the next level. Perfect for historical and fantasy campaigns!

222366.name: The Soul Tamer
222366.description:
From publisher blurb:

The wounded creature breaths heavy under your palm. It was a long battle and your victory was hard fought - but it is only half done. You reach into the beast, wrapping your fingers around its spirit and yank the soul of the beast loose. It struggles. They always struggle. You calm it, tame it, and make it your own.

The Soul Tamer is a new video game inspired playbook for Dungeon World! Capture the souls of monsters and beasts, bind them to your own and make them your allies. Mutate their spirits, fuse their souls and create powerful allies with unwavering loyalty!

Contains complete character sheet, new death move and a new soul binding mechanic!

222367.name: Song of Swords Beta 1.2
222367.description:
From the introduction:

Song of Swords is a historical and fantasy tabletop role-playing game that puts its emphasis on realism. It's a game about intense life and death conflicts, adventure with peril around every corner, deep stories, involved characters, and no holds barred combat.

Song of Swords isn't a game with hit points or ablative health. Here, injuries are devastating, debilitating, and dead-serious affairs. Even blows that don't kill immediately can kill with blood loss or infection from sloppy treatment. Survivors may suffer limps, lameness and even crippling disability. You will need sharp wits, thick armor, quick feet, great martial skill, or a combination of several of them, to survive.

You decide your character's goals, and through the Arc Points system, your character grows by progressing toward these goals, in addition to those chosen by the Gamemaster to give structure to the game's narrative. Violence may be a means to an end, but its danger means that you must pick your battles wisely, instead of charging headfirst into every combat situation.

Whether you fancy a campaign as 15th century Englishmen fighting in France under Henry V, or a desperate last stand against the Mongols in Hungary, Song of Swords can provide your historical role-playing experience. Perhaps you’re more interested in fighting Grues in the hideous depths of the Kaselreich, or fighting Goblins in the brutal tunnels of Cross Way beneath the iron hills of Dace. Again, we’ve got you covered. Welcome to Song of Swords.

222368.name: Satanic Panic
222368.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

A tabletop RPG about fighting the greatest threat known to mankind... tabletop.

Tabletop is bringing evil into the world and turning people into monsters and you are one of the few that stand against this evil. You can stop tabletop.

222369.name: Savage Species: Beastfolk
222369.description:
From publisher blurb:

Savage Species: Beastfolk is a racial supplement for the Savage Worlds roleplaying game. Inside this PDF you will find statistics for 20 playable races all themed after various animals. The races in this product are designed to be used in almost any setting. So prepare your imagination with Savage Species: Beastfolk!

Races Include:

Apefolk
Bearfolk
Catfolk
Dogfolk
Foxfolk
Rabbitfolk
Ratfolk
Hawkfolk
Killer Whale Folk
Mousefolk
Owlfolk
Otterfolk
Pigfolk
Racoonfolk
Rexfolk
Sharkfolk
Snailfolk
Toadfolk
Tricerafolk
Turtlefolk

222370.name: Fiefs of the "Kúrt Hills Atlas" Region
222370.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is a companion document to our Kurt Hills Atlas map (available via our Bethorm website). It's a quick reference to the Imperial Fiefs within the region covered by that map. The fiefs are named, the villages, towns, cities and other sites within each fief are listed, and the seat of the fief (where the fiefholder resides) is identified. This information is usable in any Tekumel-based game.

222371.name: Planar Adventures 2
222371.description:
From publisher blurb:

No time to whip up a planar battle map? No problem! Here's your solution!

Complete with 6 large, full concept battle maps, including gridded versions. Also included are 15 planar background battle maps so that you may design your own layouts.

But that's not all! As a bonus, you also get item tiles!

A total of 45 Maps and Tiles!

Just add monsters!

222372.name: Dungeon of Ice
222372.description:
From publisher blurb:

No time to whip up an ice dungeon battle map? No problem! Here's your solution!

Gaze into the dark depths of the Pit of the Frozen Whirlpool! See the horrid faces of prisoners trapped beneath a frozen lake!

A 3 level dungeon crawl complete with 3 large, full concept battle maps, including bare room and gridded versions. Also included is a customizable map tile set so that you may design your own layouts.

But that's not all! As a bonus, you also get item tiles!

A total of 42 Maps and Tiles.

Just add monsters!

222373.name: Lovecraft's Revenge
222373.description:
Lovecraft's Revenge is a tabletop game by Two Hour Wargames that plunges you into the world created by horror writer HP Lovecraft. It's about persons who dug a little too deep, driven mad by knowledge never meant for mortal minds. It's about places with thoughts and souls of their own. And it's about things whose very existence cackles at the laws of nature. These creatures defy accurate description, view people as mere insects, and can drive you out of your mind (sometimes literally) simply by standing before you.

This game can be played by any number of players; either solo, same side, or head to head.

In Lovecraft's Revenge, players control one or more characters in an rpg-like Lovecraftian adventure. Each adventure has a goal and the goal is attained by collecting clues and managing to survive the ordeal with mind and body intact. The game unfolds through a number of scenes at various general locations. Each location will likely have some kind of encounter. Some encounters will surely be of a combat nature, but others might involve solving puzzles or interacting with npc's within the adventure.

222374.name: Gods and Goddesses
222374.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

Gods and Goddesses will feature classic deities for use as a 5th edition (OGL) supplement. Inside, you will find Cleric and Paladin player character options to bring in rich levels of diversity to your new or current game. Present them as "new gods", or as "old gods" that have returned to the world. It's up to you. Change the course of events by inserting these new deities in with a surprising bang, or reveal them slowly over time.

222375.name: Print the Legend
222375.description:
Publisher's blurb:

In Print the Legend, players assume the role of characters in the year 1866, being guided through a series of scrapes, gunfights, and escapades by the gamemaster, or GM. The setting is historical; the action is not. It’s up to you to tame the New Mexico Territory through any means necessary: driving cattle, defending homesteads, digging graves, robbing banks, catching outlaws, or making a stand against an Indian charge.

As part of a team of roleplayers, you’ll take turns describing your character’s actions, making skill checks, and facing the consequences of your actions. Your choices define you: will you waylay stagecoaches and lead a life of excitement and crime, or will you seek to bring those bandits to justice?

Print the Legend is a unique and gritty entry into the sub-genre of Western RPGs:

covers every aspect of life in the West while avoiding unnecessarily complex rules.
historically rooted in the postbellum Southwest of 1866.
features a skill-based experience system using percentile dice (2d10 or 1d100)
highlights the lethality of combat and the derring-do of the men and women who defined the American Myth.

222376.name: Approach to Moergorond
222376.description:
From the introduction:

The island of Ghaol Dhalld stretches for more than 300 miles southeast into the Sea of Storms from the Nidevellir continent, separated from the mainland by the 14 miles of the Strait of Storms. The center of the island is dominated by three chains of mountains, the Bahlphon, the Zelanaw, and the Widkallens. Moer Vale lies deep in the Zelanaw Mountains, near the island center. Dwarves came to Ghaol Dhalld more than 3000 years ago, and by 2250 years past reached the Moer Vale, establishing a silver mine at the foot of Wydorrith Mountain. Over the next 500 years the Dwarves found gold on Juttermad Mountain, iron on Mount Paagdoon, and coal on Ker Wert and Mountain Trewk. They also founded the town of Kolli on Lake Moer, and the villages Lokdell and Mantry. The city that came to be called Moergorond developed from the original silver mine and became a major Dwarven center.

222377.name: Fantastic Exciting Imaginative (Volume 1 - Feb 2017)
222377.description:
Fantastic Exciting Imaginative
Volume 1
February 2017

Available formats:


Full Version (on screen)
Crop Version (home printing)

222379.name: Ever After: Twisted Realm
222379.description:
Description from the designer:

Ever After: Twisted Realm is a unique objective based Board game where player takes a role as a character from one faction between “Dawnguard” and “Eclipse”. Each player is secretly assigned a team at the start of the game.

There is no player elimination in this game. Player wins or loses with the team by comparing team victory points. Player gains VP (Victory Point) by completing quests, controlling areas and bonus power from identity skill.

The game starts by dealing character card secretly to each player as Identity Card. Then randomly select leftover character cards to make a draft pool for Partner Cards. Each player will have 1 secret Identity card and 1 Face-up Partner card. The partner card will have its ability during game play while the identity card will define your team and guide your play style by its extra score condition.
Player plays the game by moving around the map to complete the quest, conquer more areas, attacking other players or killing world boss. Player will get to know other players identity through rumor system which will let you know some information and guess from their actions.
At the end of the game, all victory points gathered from each player will be summed up as team score and the team with higher score wins the game.

222380.name: Brutus: The board game
222380.description:
Description from the publisher:

In the 2000s, each player is one of the VIPs of Small City. Each one hides behind a pseudonym of a Roman emperor, based on the special ability that player chose at the beginning of the game.

The goal of the game is to racketeer the Commerces, to rob the Residences, and to hire new thugs in the Industries.

Each turn, you move your Roman empire figure, and can either destroy or burgle a building. Thus you gain more and more influence in the districts….

The player who builds up the most influence in Small City will be the winner.

The city is represented on a hex hex grid, and its size depends on the number of players.

There are two ways to play this new politically incorrect game in the Small City universe.

A book should be included in the box. It is a hard-boiled novel that deals with the story of the same 6 emperors, which takes place after the story of the board game.

A new concept to expand the board game….

222381.description:
This is a Playmat for Qwirkle with connect special rules.

Before you start draw a tile and put it on each black spot.

You must add blocks to existing tiles. When putting a block on a spot with points you gain that many addiontal points
222381.name: Qwirkle: Connect

222382.name: Watizit
222382.description:
Each player combines 3 randomly drawn cards to create funny bans, then draw them to make the other players guess what is forbidden.
"No surfing mice with mittens", "No guitar playing for mummies", "No DJ pirates in the shower"…

The games last 3 rounds, then the player with the most points (from guessing others' bans, and having their own guessed) wins.

222383.name: Math+Op
222383.description:
Math+Op is a card game based on math problem solving together. Each players have number cards. Players choose a rulesmaker at first. Each person get one card from number card deck. Player who gets big number is rulesmaker. Rulesmaker gives ten card at a time face down, beginning with the player on the right. Each player gets 10 cards but rulesmaker 11 cards. The remaining number cards and operations cards are placed face down separately on the table, forming the stock.

Rulesmaker placed at first number card. Player at right of rulesmaker gets number or operation card from stock and placed. Player who placed result number card is winner.

222384.name: Solitaire: Decked Out
222384.description:
Description from Google Play
The Classic Solitaire you know and love but WITHOUT Ads.
Unlock themed decks and discover unique winning ceremonies!

Beat the game to earn coins and unlock decks and decorative items.

DECK OUT your play experience with different themes and effects.
Themes include penguins, flowers, hot dogs, UFOs, and more!
Let’s get DECKED OUT!

Features:
- unlimited FREE games without ads
- Klondike style card game
- Play anywhere! offline mode available
- HOW TO PLAY instructions for beginners
- standard 1-card or 3-card draw
- 90+ challenging achievements
- 90+ decorative items
- pause the game at any time
- game status saved automatically
- both portrait and landscape mode supported
- unlimited hints and undos

For Parents:
Solitaire: Decked Out is free to download and play. But content can also be unlocked through in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

222386.name: Dice With Ellen
222386.description:
Dice with Ellen is a fun new dice game that lets you play games with friends, family and even Ellen DeGeneres herself! See who can score a Five-a-palooza! You can even challenge your favorite members of Ellen’s squad like Portia, tWitch, Jeannie and Andy to win loads of fun prizes. Take on Ellen’s Lucky Dice Challenge and if you beat her daily score Ellen’s Lucky Dice are yours to play with for the day! Player’s around the world will know you’re a real high roller when you show up to a game with those Lucky Dice!

Source: The Developer Website.

222387.name: The Walking Dead:  Road To Survival
222387.description:
Before you stands the perceived safe haven of Woodbury. Little do you know a madman will rise to governing power, pitting people against each other in ways that make you question humanity. A small group of rebels will fight for their lives to break free from the tyranny - will you be brave enough to fight with them?

A thrilling, mature adventure constantly toeing the line between life and the undead, Walking Dead: Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead role-playing game experience. Based on an all-new story from award winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you fight for survival.

Source: The Developer Website.

222388.description:
This map is an unofficial fan made expansion. Symbols & Graphics Copyright © 2004-2015 Days of Wonder, Inc. Produced with permission of Days of Wonder, for non-commercial use only.

This follows the principles of the basic Ticket to Ride game on a special board with special cards and rules. The object of the game is to gain the most points by travelling various routes and outwitting other players. You will need the train pieces and the train cards from either the US or Europe base games (or you can buy them from the Days of Wonder shop.

There is an extra set of Tourist cards for the cities, each with a value to be earned by visiting that city. These cards are dealt/picked up alongwith tickets in the same quantity and with the same 'keep/dispose' rules. There are also choice cards which may help or hinder you.

There are 9 challenges which can give you extra points if you complete a particular tour.

There are many new options in the rules: exchange all your cards at the start but keep all the new ones: discard 5 cards and pick up 5 new ones, as your turn: add two routes together: and many more. You can also call time when your wagon stock reaches 3, if you want, giving you the advantage of stopping other players completing tickets.
222388.name: Canada 2017 (fan expansion of Ticket to Ride)

222389.name: Super Mario Tower
222389.description:
Bowser sits on top of his tower, but it starts shaking as more and more Yoshis and Toads are invading the tower. Super Mario is trying to climb to the top as well, making things even more shaky.

In this game of dexterity, players take turns rolling a die, to see on which of the colored layers of the tower they have to place one of the Toads or Yoshis. As more miniatures get added to the tower, it gets less and less stable. If Bowser falls off the top, the player whose turn it was loses the round.

222390.name: Disco Bees
222390.description:
Disco Bees™ is the fun and imaginative new way to play Match 3 puzzle games. If you like original puzzle games and love to smile, this is the game for you.
Bee prepared to play the puzzle game named as one of the "Best New Games" by Apple's Editor's Choice.

Source: The Developer Website.

222391.name: Dice With Buddies
222391.description:
hallenge your friends as you roll your way to victory in this ultra-addictive dice game

Source: The Developer Website.

222393.name: Catan: Playmat Gold
222393.description:
This is a Playmat for Catan with special rules.

The desert is replaced a gold field where you can get the resource of your choice.

222394.name: Catan: Playmat Desert
222394.description:
This is a Playmat for Catan with special rules.

Catan is suffering droughts, cross the desserts to reach the furtile oasises.

222395.name: Catan: Playmat Island
222395.description:
This is a Playmat for Catan: Seafarers with special rules.

Catan is divided in multiple islands. On some, pastures are missing, on others forests. How will you be able to make ships?

222396.name: Catan: Playmat Atoll
222396.description:
This is a Playmat for Catan: Cities & Knights with special rules.

Defend catan from attacks of barbarians.

222398.name: Slavers' Compound
222398.description:
Publisher Blurb:

20 Things #12: Slavers’ Compound comprises the following 20 Things articles:

8 Minor Events to Happen in a Slavers’ Compound
10 Slaves with Personality
10 Slavers with Personality
20 Pieces of Dungeon Dressing for a Slaver Compound
20 Things to Loot from a Slaver’s Body

222399.name: Il Principe Ranocchio
222399.description:
Description from the publisher (translated):

In Il Principe Ranocchio (The Frog Kiss), each player is a prince turned into a frog by the evil court sorcerer (who wants to marry the Princess with impunity). The objective of each player is return human again, but the only manner do so is to accumulate power by eating insects and then ... kiss the Princess!

The pond is represented by a playmat, on which the water lilies and the insects are placed. The frogs can hop hon themand eat the insects. Each player controls a frog with a rolling tongue, which can easily catch the insects.

During his turn, each frog has two actions (also identical) to choose from the 4 avalilable: jumping on an adjacent free water lily, bouncing on another frog to reach a free water lily, replace a free water lily, or roll the tongue to catch insects / kiss the Princess. But you can kiss the Princess only if you have collected a sufficient number of insects.

Each frog has its own asymmetric power and, every Princess needs a different collection of insects to be kissed and change the rules in a different way. Adapt your strategy to the actual Princess and to your power, and slow down the leader. May the prince with the longest tongue win!

Description from the publisher:

Ne 'Il Principe Ranocchio', ogni giocatore impersona un principe trasformato in un Ranocchio dal malvagio stregone di corte (che vuole sposare la Principessa impunemente). L'Obiettivo di ogni giocatore è tornare umano, ma per farlo deve accumulare potere mangiando insetti per poi ... baciare la Principessa!

Lo stagno è rappresentato da un tappetino playmat, su cui vengono piazzate le ninfee su cui i ranocchi possono saltellare e gli insetti che devono catturare. Ogni giocatore controlla un ranocchio con la lingua srotolabile, con cui può agevolmente acchiappare gli insetti.

Durante il proprio turno, ogni ranocchio ha due azioni (anche uguali) a scelta fra le 4 disponibili: saltare su una ninfea libera adiacente, rimbalzare su un'altro ranocchio per arrivare su una ninfea libere, ricollocare una ninfea libera, oppure srotolare la lingue per acchiappare degli insetti o ... baciare la principessa. E' possibile baciare la Principessa soltanto se si sono raccolti un numero adeguato di insetti.

Ogni Ranocchio ha il proprio potere ed ogni Principessa richiede una diversa collezione di insetti per essere baciata e modifica le regole in un modo diverso. Adeguate la vostra strategia alla Principessa in gioco e al vostro potere, e rallentate chi è in vantaggio. E che vinca il principe più linguacciuto!

222400.name: WWE Champions
222400.description:
WWE: Champions is the new puzzle RPG that pits the WWE’s greatest Superstars against each other in the ultimate quest for stardom. Create and customize your team of WWE Superstars, and brawl through generations of the WWE’s greatest. Think you’ve got the best team? Prove it! Send your team of WWE Superstars into the ring and test your fighting skills. Match gems across the board and make your move. Win, and your champions will live on as immortals. Lose, and face defeat at your opponent’s hands. Come join a community of fellow WWE fans and start battling for reputation, power and ultimate bragging rights in WWE: Champions!

Source: The Developer Website.

222401.name: Campus Cafè
222401.description:
Life is really busy on a college campus and the only place to really relax is the Cafeteria. This applies to everyone, except for you, since you are working students who served as waiters in the Cafeteria.

Each player control a waiter with its own asymmetric power, to use to overcome others. At the start of the game the objectives of the Month are revealed (for example, serve the largrest number of Hot Chocolates or the largest number of Professors).

During his turn the player rolls 2 coloured dice, and places them on spaces of the same colour. Special training skills allow you to re-roll the dice or turn a color in to another. Each space, based on the color, allows you to prepare specific drinks (there are 5 drinks on the menu). Once prepared, the player adds the drink to his or her tray: but beware the tray is heavy, so space is limited (some training skills allow you to unlock more space).

At the end of turn, the player can choose to process one (or more, if you have the specific training ability) of the orders backlog on the Game Board: you must have and discard all the drinks shown on the card, get paid the bill ($ are Victory Points) and then pick up the Order Card, and place it in front of you. Specific training skills allow you to get extra tips from particular clients and/or drinks served. Once collected the Order card, the player will be allowed to use the special training ability shown on the card: the experience is always a teacher of life.

At a certain point, the cafeteria closes (there are a fixed number of Orders card to be processed, according to the number of players) and the round is ended, in a way that all players has performed the same number of game turns. A this stage the 'Employee of the Month' prizes are awarded and, who has the most Victory Points ($) is declared the winner.

Tipologiy: entry-level Splendor-like (Dice Placement)


La vita è veramente intensa in un campus universitario e l'unico posto per rilassarsi è la Caffetteria. Questo vale per tutti, tranne che per voi, visto che siete studenti lavoratori che servite come camerieri nella Caffetteria.

Ogni giocatore dispone di un Cameriere con un proprio potere asimmetrico, da sfruttare al meglio per prevalere sugli altri. Ad inizio partita vengono estratti gli Obiettivi del Mese, fra cui, ad esempio, servire il maggior numero di Cioccolate Calde oppure servire il maggior numero di Professori.

Durante il proprio turno il giocatore tira 2 Dadi colorati, e li colloca su spazi dello stesso colore. Particolari abilità formazione consentono di ritirare i dadi o di trasformare un colore in un altro. Ogni spazio, in base al colore, permette di preparare specifiche bibite (vi sono 5 bibite nel menù). Una volta preparata, il giocatore aggiunge la bibita al proprio vassoio: ma attenzione il vassoio è pesante, quindi gli spazi sono limitati (alcune abilità formazione permettono di sbloccare più spazi).

A fine turno il giocatore può scegliere di evadere uno (o più di uno se ha l'apposita abilità formazione) degli ordini inevasi presenti sul Tabellone: deve consumare tutte le bibite indicate, farsi pagare il conto (i $ sono Punti Vittoria) quindi raccogliere la carta Ordine, e piazzarla davanti a se'. Specifiche abilità formazione consentono di ottenere mance extra da particolari clienti e/o bibite servite. Da quel momento il giocatore beneficia dell'abilità formazione indicata sulla carta: infatti l'esperienza è sempre maestra di vita.

Ad un certo punto la caffetteria chiude (ci sono un numero prefissato di ordini da evadere, in base al numero di giocatori) e si completa il round, in modo che tutti abbiano eseguito lo stesso numero di turni. Quindi sono assegnati i premi Impiegato del Mese. A questo punto, chi ha più Punti Vittoria ($) è dichiarato vincitore.

Tipologia: per tutti (Piazzamento Dadi)

222402.name: Yahtzee With Buddies
222402.description:
The original family game you know and love in the palm of your hand. Find out why over 50 MILLION copies of the classic game are sold every year! After one session you’ll understand why over 100 MILLION people play Yahtzee on a regular basis. Play with friends, family or new opponents from around the world. You can even challenge players in Dice with Buddies™! Pick up your shaker and dice and prepare to shout “YAHTZEE”!

Source: The Developer Website.

222403.description:
Description from the book:

In Larger Than Life – Directors Cut you learned that it all boils down to the Story and we gave you the tools to create them.

In Action we’ve taken it a step farther; now we’ve given you three full blown adventures. Each Story comes complete with pre-generated Stars, Co-Stars, Big Bads, and more, but they will work just as well with your own cast.

STORY #1 – You’re “Duke” Clayton, world traveling adventurer, and you’re girlfriend Leilani, has been kidnapped by a power crazed villain – and what about Hooni, the Great Squid God?

STORY #2 – You’re the Gray Raven – a Vigilante whose current case involves stolen artifacts and murders – not one, but many. You’ll be required to bring your best as you travel south to a Hidden Valley deep in the Peruvian jungle.

STORY #3 – It’s Germany 1935 and there’s been a scientist kidnapped. In our 3rd adventure we’ve given you a classic pre-World War II spy story, but with a couple of twists.
222403.name: Larger Than Life: Director's Cut – Action!

222404.name: Mini Golf Matchup
222404.description:
User Summary

Mobile mini folf title with multiplayer network function.

222405.name: Slots Vacation
222405.description:
Kick back at exotic destinations and win big in this premium-resort-vacation slots experience with huge payouts, tons of machines, and fun mini-games and bonus rounds.
In Slots Vacation™, you’ll travel to spectacular beaches, ancient Egypt, an underwater paradise, and many more places through our many Las Vegas-casino-quality slot machines with beautiful HD vacation graphics, exciting bonus rounds, and incredible payouts.

Source: The Developer Website.

222406.name: Kingdom Of The Realm
222406.description:
User Summary

Real-time strategy MMO with medieval theme by Scopely.

222407.description:
Description from the publisher:

Starting with a limited amount of resources and workers, you set out to run your lumber mill as efficiently as possible. Savvy investments and proper planning will ensure that your mill will be the most profitable. Be cautious, however, for competition is fierce! You will need to secure the best cutting areas, make use of limited contract workers, and continually update and replace your equipment. Your competitors are not the only thing to worry about as you will also need to store enough firewood and food to survive the harsh winters.

Lignum is a strategic optimization game that portrays the logging industry in the 19th century. Each round, players travel to the nearby forest, picking up tools and hiring workers along the way. After felling timber, players must decide how to transport their wood to their sawmills and if the wood should be processed or sold immediately, all the while optimizing their entire processing chain.

The second edition of Lignum also includes the "Joinery & Buildings" expansion. In this expansion, players can visit two additional locations along the supply path. Players may now acquire special buildings that give them unique, special abilities for the remainder of the game. Additionally, players can acquire joiners to help generate more income each round; if those joiners are supplied with the appropriate wood, players can earn extra money at the end of the game!
222407.name: Lignum (second edition)

222408.name: Le Voleur
222408.description:
Paris, the city of lights, love and arts. An exotic location with all its glory. Unfortunately, it is also a perfect place for an act of heist! In Le Voleur (the thief), you will gather a team of thieves trying to steal loots from various districts in downton Paris. Be mindful with your steps because not only you have to plan carefully and dodge the patrolling police, but rumor says there are other teams trying to expose you! Be careful with your planning and notes, because even a slightest mistake might ruin your perfectly planned heist!

Le Voleur is a logic-strategic game for 2 to 4 players. There are 2 main mechanics going on: the main board with area control and player board with deduction. On the main board, players need to create patterns by flipping colored tokens. With the right pattern, players can Scout and finally Steal the good. To flip the tokens, players need to use one of the Abilities of their agents, 4 are taken randomly from bag at setup, by turning their Agent's dial to show the desired abilities (shared color with the token on the board). Other players may mark these abilities on their player board, called Headquarter, which also shows the identity of all agents available in the game. Everytime an Agent use their abilities these clue grows and eventually reveal the Agent correct identity.
The game played in 8 turns. Each turn are consist of several phases and each phase shows how many agents a player can play. If a player have less than 4 agents, he eventually lost all ability to use any actions on that phase and can only recruit new agents. Victory Points are collected by either Steal a Good or exposing other Agents. The first player with 5 Victory Points wins the game.

222409.name: The Kingdom of Richard
222409.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Kingdom of Richard is the first in a series of gazetteers fleshing out the Darkfast Dungeons setting. Designed to fit into classic fantasy games, elements of this setting can be used “as is” or bits and pieces can be adapted to fit into on-going campaigns or sandbox games. This book is designed as a stand-alone product and contains stats that can be used for Darkfast Dungeons and Swords and Wizardry: White Box (or any other old school role playing game based on the classic edition.)

This gazetteer opens up the Darkfast Dungeon game to more "theatre of the mind" game play, but it will require a GM to referee the game. It's a whole new way to play Darkfast Dungeons.

This adventure includes four new character class for Swords and Wizardry: White Box and Darkfast Dungeons and write ups for eight new opponents.

The Kingdom of Richard helps flesh out this setting that I created as my original D&D campaign back in 1981.

222410.name: Asphalt Xtreme
222410.description:
Get dirty as you rip through the mud in this brand-new off-road racing spinoff of the Asphalt franchise! Drive dozens of all-terrain speedsters, from Monster Trucks to Buggies and tame Mother Nature in various exotic all-terrain environments! Soar through the air with adrenaline-filled stunts to leave your opponents in the dust! NO ROADS, NO RULES, GO XTREME!

Source: The Developer Website.

222411.name: These Stars Are Ours!
222411.description:
From publisher blurb:

These Stars Are Ours is a space-opera setting for the Cepheus Engine Core Rules and other 2D6 OGL SciFi games. Set in 2260 AD - two years after the Terrans took Keid and forced the Reticulan Empire to capitulate the book it introduces the player characters to the immediate aftermath of the Terran victory in the Terran Liberation War against the mighty Reticulan Empire and its many thralls. For their part, the upstart Terrans, bolstered by their victory against their old masters, now move to become a power to be reckoned with in interstellar affairs. Against this background of espionage, maneuvering, and saber-rattling, and on the new interstellar frontiers, the player characters can forge a destiny of heroes or villains of the new United Terran Republic. The book provides all the astrography and background necessary to set a sci-fi campaign in the exciting times of the 23rd century.

It is two years after we won the War against our old Reticulan masters. We - the children of Mother Terra - are now free to forge our destiny and put our mark on the stars. These stars are ours! This is a time for bold men and women to step up and claim the universe. We need intrepid explorers to discover the riches of our far frontiers; enterprising merchants to open new trade routes with far-away alien stars; cunning spies and agents to protect us from any alien plot against our hard-won independence; and of course - daring soldiers and spacemen to protect our borders and push back those who would enslave us again.

We are not alone - brave Cicek warriors and even Reticulan and Ssesslessian defectors fought along our side against the Reticulan legions. Against this mighty alliance, stand our many enemies - both internal and external. Corrupt politicians and crime-lords plot to turn our glorious Republic into their own plaything at our expense. Ruthless pirates and raiders rob far-flung colonies, heedless of the opening they give to our greater enemy. In the shadows, House Thiragin - the Reticulan noble house which once ruled Terra with an iron fist - plots and plans for its ultimate revenge on us upstart “barbarians”. For all of this - children of the Earth – Mother Terra needs you!

This book contains:

History and background material for 23rd century Terra and the larger universe.
Corporations, political parties, and illegal groups – both Terran and alien.
4 major alien species and several minor ones – all detailed.
Rules for generating and playing characters from 6 alien species.
7 alien careers and 12 Terran ones.
Advanced character generation rules and event tables for all included careers.
Rules for cybernetic augmentation, body modification, and cyborg conversion.
2 small craft and 5 starships with full game statistics and high-res deck plans.
The Terran Borderlands including 64 detailed worlds and a high-res star map.
12 Patrons offering adventurous missions to the players' characters.




Note that this book provides character generations, biological and cultural background, and flying saucers (!) for playing Grey Aliens from Zeta 2 Reticuli – ready to drop into any Cepheus Engine campaign!

222412.name: I'm so happy
222412.description: Learn to recognize and name the 4 basic emotions with this game. The children take turns in rotating the dial. When the dial stops, the child whose turn it is, takes a card with the same face as indicated by the dial and places it on his assignment card. The first to fill his or her assignment card wins the game. The assignment cards are all different. It is possible to do a group activity with the large emotion cards or use the cards for group discussion.

222413.name: Fussballspiel Fortuna
222413.description:
Each player has 10 field players and one goalie. Movement is determined by a die. The direction may be changed once during movement. If a player gets on the same space as the ball he gets an extra move for the ball. The ball can't change direction during movement. The ball may move through occupied spaces. If the movement of the ball ends not on the space of a friendly field player, the opponent gets his turn. If the movement of the ball ends on one of the three numbered spaces in front of the goal, the goalie catches the ball, if he rolls one of the numbers shown on the space the ball is in.

After an agreed on playing time the player who gets the most goals wins the game.

222416.name: Judges Guild Journal (Issue 17 - Oct/Nov 1979)
222416.description:
Features:
The Wilderness Project
The Nightmare Flask
Belegost
Farlin Ironshod
The Adventures of Antoinne De Rebbierre
From Tavern to Dungeon
Heraldry Tables
Martial Artists
Designer's Notes - Dark Tower
The Mythos of Har

222417.name: Wrecking Crew
222417.description:
From publisher blurb:

Wrecking Crew: General Philip Dermarco, a failed dictator and an old enemy of the ARST, has gone into hiding with many of the millions he looted from his country. For the most part, he has been living in retirement. However, from time to time he has attempted to have those he blames for his failed schemes killed. That includes the ARST. While he remains in hiding, though, the ARST hasn't been able to strike back at him. But now an old contact has dropped them some intel revealing Demarco's current whereabouts – a palatial villa on the island of Puerto Liato. ...It's time for the ARST to pay him a little visit.

222418.name: Ends of War
222418.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ends of War: The civil war in Daol has gone on for two, nearly three, decades now, barring a brief one-month respite when there were peace talks back in '79. It's one of the longest wars on record. Some people even started to think the war would never end. But the PRO faction suddenly collapsed. The ARST, who were working for the PRO at the time, are on their way out of country when they are offered one more job in the area at a pay rate that just can't be refused. That job: rescue a number of PRO officials still trapped in country who have been deemed too important to allow to fall into enemy hands. But, it will mean snatching those officials right out from under the nose of an advancing enemy army

222419.name: Folkways
rpgissuearticle: HARP Folkways Preview Excerpt: A Folkway of Cyradon
HARP Folkways Preview Excerpt: A Folkway of Shadow World
222419.description:
From publisher blurb:

Continue your journey on the new road to High Adventure

You can take a hero out of the Borderlands but you cannot take the Borderlands out of the hero.

Enrich your characters and your world with unparalleled cultural depth. Explore the diversity of cultures across twenty folkways drawing upon our world and fantasy classics. Make your own unique cultures by defining how they handle matters of kinship, authority and the supernatural, how they dress and what they eat, and more. Worked examples including cultures from Shadow World and Cyradon will inspire your creativity.
HARP Folkways provides GMs and players with:

The Twenty Folkways – a technique to create believable cultures for any setting
A cultural perspective on well-known fantasy worlds from literature
Practical examples of culture creation including examples from Shadow World and Cyradon
Eleven new HARP races
Six new HARP cultural adolescence packages
Ten new HARP professions
New skills and talents
Twenty-three new HARP training packages

222420.name: Amazons Vs Valkyries: Languages
222420.description:
From publisher blurb:

Within this file:

54 Living Languages and a random table to determine your character's homeland and starting language.
35 Extinct Languages and DCs for researching and deciphering them.
Magical Languages and an overview of the three cultures of magic (Egyptian, Minoan, and Mitanni).
A full color, highly detailed map of the campaign world!
Plenty of information on the history and cultures of the setting
Expanded realistic rules for learning and comprehension of language
4 characters from Amazons Vs Valkyries introduced as examples (Tora, Seyeh, Kara, and Padia).
Sacred Languages, Secret Languages, Sign Languages, Rogue Languages, Trade Languages, and more!
New feats for languages including Demagoguery, Polyglot, and Hyperpolyglot.
12 game seeds and plot hooks involving language
Dozens of sample character names (and their meanings) organized by culture.
